title: Hearts Love Watch Face Pro
summary: Lovely watch face - Anti Pixel Burn in Ambient Mode
description: Impress your loved ones with this elegant watch face.Features:- Elegant hearts for your loved ones- Glitter diamond interface- Anti Pixel Burn with a combination of even and odd pixels in an ambient mode for energy conservation in LED screens. Battery saving designs.Please feel free to send us your valuable feedback and suggestions. Your feedback is important to us. Enjoy lovely watch face.
descriptionHTML:
Impress your loved ones with this elegant watch face.

Features:
- Elegant hearts for your loved ones
- Glitter diamond interface
- Anti Pixel Burn with a combination of even and odd pixels in an ambient mode for energy conservation in LED screens. Battery saving designs.

Please feel free to send us your valuable feedback and suggestions. Your feedback is important to us. Enjoy lovely watch face.
